stepTitle: Now, calculate the change in enthalpy when $$3.00$$ moles of propane (C₃H₈) is heated through the same temperature range at constant pressure.
stepBody:
Assume the molar heat capacity at constant pressure for polyatomic gases is:
$$C_p= rac{7}{2}$$ R, where $$R=8.314$$ J $${mol}^{-1}$$ $$K^{-1}$$.

Compute your answer in kJ to one decimal place.
